类 CardGamePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardGamePlayer

  • public class CardGamePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to represent a player in general card games.
    作者:
    Kenneth Wong

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      CardGamePlayer()
      Creates and returns an instance of the Player class.
      CardGamePlayer(java.lang.String name)
      Creates and returns an instance of the Player class.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addCard(Card card)
      Adds the specified card to this player.
      CardList getCardsInHand()
      Returns the list of cards held by this player.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of this player.
      int getNumOfCards()
      Returns the number of cards held by this player.
      CardList play(int[] cardIdx)
      Returns the list of cards played by this player.
      void removeAllCards()
      Removes all cards from this player.
      void removeCards(CardList cards)
      Removes the list of cards from this player, if they are held by this player.
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name of this player.
      void sortCardsInHand()
      Sorts the list of cards held by this player.

      • CardGamePlayer

        public CardGamePlayer(java.lang.String name)
        Creates and returns an instance of the Player class.
        参数:
        name - the name of the player

    • 方法详细资料

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this player.
        返回:
        the name of this player

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of this player.
        参数:
        name - the name of this player

      • addCard

        public void addCard(Card card)
        Adds the specified card to this player.
        参数:
        card - the specified card to be added to this player

      • removeCards

        public void removeCards(CardList cards)
        Removes the list of cards from this player, if they are held by this player.
        参数:
        cards - the list of cards to be removed from this player

      • removeAllCards

        public void removeAllCards()
        Removes all cards from this player.

      • getNumOfCards

        public int getNumOfCards()
        Returns the number of cards held by this player.
        返回:
        the number of cards held by this player

      • sortCardsInHand

        public void sortCardsInHand()
        Sorts the list of cards held by this player.

      • getCardsInHand

        public CardList getCardsInHand()
        Returns the list of cards held by this player.
        返回:
        the list of cards held by this player

      • play

        public CardList play(int[] cardIdx)
        Returns the list of cards played by this player.
        参数:
        cardIdx - the list of the indices of the cards
        返回:
        the list of cards played by this player, or null if the list of cards is empty
